movie.title: Minions
movie.actors: Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Michael Keaton, Allison Janney
movie.plot: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 24 nominations.
